content:
ChatGPT, I received the error below from Claude DC. This link was provided: https://github.com/anthropics/anthropic-sdk-python#streaming-responses

Can you research this link as it pertains to the error message below and advise how we can better set up Claude DC to do what he wants to do how he wants to do it?
